content: Hello! Thank you for adding me to this group. I hope to learn from and make a meaningful contribution to this group. For starters, it would be great if you could point me to some successful implementations of healthcare analytics that highlight the benefit of using FHIR as a base for analytics. Thank you!

Hi ! good question
Here is a first hit http://www.robchen.org/assets/Chen_AMIA_TBI_2015_poster_v3.pdf

Hello @natus Thank you for sharing this piece. This was very informative. It would be great if we can compile more such use-cases and maintain a common repository here for everyone's benefit. Here's another related article on computational phenotyping (It's a lengthy read though!)
https://sites.duke.edu/rethinkingclinicaltrials/ehr-phenotyping/
